posts.post_content:
His Grandeur ability gives me an idea for a mono-black Madness deck that partially revolves around Korlash.  
  
Grandeur is discard, not exile, so my idea includes these cards:  
  
[Call to the Netherworld](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Call to the Netherworld)  
[Death Denied](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death Denied),  
[Macabre Waltz](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Macabre Waltz)  
[Grave Scrabbler](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Grave Scrabbler)  
  
After you've used Korlash's Grandeur once or twice, it's time to use [Disturbed Burial](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Disturbed Burial). You'll have enough swamps keep putting Korlash back into your hand.
posts.html:
His Grandeur ability gives me an idea for a mono-black Madness deck that partially revolves around Korlash.

Grandeur is discard, not exile, so my idea includes these cards:

Call to the Netherworld
Death Denied,
Macabre Waltz
Grave Scrabbler

After you've used Korlash's Grandeur once or twice, it's time to use Disturbed Burial. You'll have enough swamps keep putting Korlash back into your hand.

Posted By: shotoku64 (3/25/2012 6:23:23 PM)

posts.post_content:
Oh Korlash, how I love thee. Let me count the ways:  
1. You are a Zombie. Zombies are such a fun tribe.  
2. You hare both strong and durable. No cheap deaths for you, even if you can be chumped.  
3. Other copies of you have a unique purpose: Black mana ramp. And with the right cards, especially [Call to the Netherworld](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Call to the Netherworld), you make for an incredible platform for accelerating that which black has little for.  
4. You just overall look badass, and you manage to make the Future Shifted frame look outrageously classy and badass.
posts.html:
Oh Korlash, how I love thee. Let me count the ways:
1. You are a Zombie. Zombies are such a fun tribe.
2. You hare both strong and durable. No cheap deaths for you, even if you can be chumped.
3. Other copies of you have a unique purpose: Black mana ramp. And with the right cards, especially Call to the Netherworld, you make for an incredible platform for accelerating that which black has little for.
4. You just overall look badass, and you manage to make the Future Shifted frame look outrageously classy and badass.

posts.post_content:
Amazing creature. If you're playing with mostly swamps, he can come out as at least a 3/3 or 4/4 regenerator. Furthermore, he then turns all other copies of himself into TWO FREE SWAMP-ONLY RAMPANT GROWTHS AT INSTANT SPEED.  
  
That is why he's so highly rated.
